Appetite Controller.name: Appetite Controller
Appetite Controller.description:
Suppresses hunger response. User ignores Humanity Loss penalties from starvation trauma but User can still starve. Roll a Death Save at start of 7th consecutive day without eating. +1 to successive Death Saves each day afterwards.

Requires Biomonitor.

Combat Tail.name: Combat Tail
Combat Tail.description: Implanted Heavy Melee Weapon. Requires Neural Link.

Firebreather.name: Firebreather
Firebreather.description: Implanted Exotic Shotgun. Can only hold one incendiary shotgun shell.

Heuristic Health Monitor.name: Heuristic Health Monitor
Heuristic Health Monitor.description: Requires biomonitor. Can know HP at a glance.

NeuTongue.name: NeuTongue
NeuTongue.description:
Simulates flavor sensations. Use a linked Agent to customize flavor profiles. Can be deactivated without an Action. No sense of taste when deactivated.

Replaces Meat tongue.

Reflex Co-Processor.name: Reflex Co-Processor
Reflex Co-Processor.description: Neuralware. Negates REF requirement to dodge bullets.
